text: "That's What You Get" is a 2008 song by Paramore. It is off the album RIOT!. Its music video was released on March 24, 2008.paramore.net – "That's What You Get Video Premieres Today" – March 24, 2008 It is the music video about which Hayley Williams said "You will really get to see who they are. We had a load of family and friends surround us for the video and it just felt so natural". Also, in the video, the band plays in a room, as well as Williams outside singing to an audience and using body language. == References == Category:2008 songs Category:Paramore songs Category:Pop rock songs
title: That's What You Get
